nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM CHRIS BRINGING HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN MEXICO...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM CHRIS BRINGING HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN MEXICO...
 As of 4:00 AM CDT Mon Jul 1
 the center of Chris was located near 20.1, -97.2
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
